overview: Michael, master of the house, invites his friends John, Tom and Leo over for dinner, but they all seem more interested in his manservant, Chose Armando. Before long Chose is being served up naked on the dining room table, turning into a cock sucking and ass plugging buffet. Things get a bit too hot by the fire, turning into naked fun. Things settle down, and two ghosts get frisky, they're caught and a third joins in. Next day, the butlers clean up but take a break to have some fun of their own.
title: Wild Castle
